name: c00l cliche
description:
++ C00L CLICHE ++
You're an alien from the planet Lichi HYX that's just come
back home after a gap year schlepping around the United States.
Impress your friends with your newfound mastery of the
English language by sharing some popular phrases!
Keep it smooth—Don't take too long!

++ INSTRUCTIONS ++
Mouse-click to select the correct words for each blank in the phrase!

~~ vashdev + rnukez' submission for Game-Off 2022 ~~
++ bgm by Kevin MacLeod / sfx by ZapSplat ++

** THANKS FOR PLAYING !! **
